item.title: COVID 19 Data Visualization
item.description: Abstract “COVID19 pandemic is an ongoing worldwide pandemic deeply affected people’s daily living. By analysising the COVID 19 dataset from Toronto Public Health center, we conclude that elderly people suffers more risk than youngests.” Introduction Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID) is an infectious disease and was first identified in December 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei province. The virus is spread primarily via small droplets such as coughing, talking, etc. The median incubation period for COVID-19 is around 5 days, sometimes it could last up to 14 days.
